testcase.name: verify new SCD login functionalty with Negative Login Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user click on New SCD username text field.............................passed When user enters invalid username and password..............................passed And click on sign in button to login into New SCD...........................passed And user refresh the login page.............................................passed Then user enters valid username and password................................passed And user click on sign in button to login into New SCD......................passed

testcase.name: Create New User
testcase.system-out: Given click on expand button................................................passed When click on user management...............................................passed Then click on create new user...............................................passed And enter details in create user form and save..............................passed Then click on logout button.................................................passed
